Variable Initialization.description: Initialize a new variable at your cursor

Variable Declaration.description: Declare a variable at your cursor

Function Definition.description: Create a new named function definition at your cursor or around a selection

Function Expression.description: Create a new function expression at your cursor or around a selection

Arrow Function.description: Create a new arrow function at your cursor

Immediately Invoked Function Expression.description: Create a new IIFE at your cursor or around a selection

Function Call.description: Create a new call to a function at your cursor

Function Call With Context.description: Create new function call with object context at cursor

Function Binding.description: Create new function binding at cursor

Function Application.description: Create new function application at cursor

If Block.description: Create a new if block at your cursor or around a selection

Else-If Block.description: Create a new else block at your cursor or around a selection

Else Block.description: Create a new else block at your cursor or around a selection

Loop For.description: Create a for loop at your current cursor position or around a selection

Loop For-In.description: Create a for-in loop at your current cursor position or around a selection

Loop For-Of.description: Create a for-of loop at your current cursor position or around a selection

Loop While.description: Create a for loop at your current cursor position or around a selection

String Literal.description: Insert a string literal at your cursor

String -- Template Literal.description: Insert a string literal at your cursor

String -- Template Variable.description: Insert a template literal variable at your cursor

Console Method Call.description: Insert a new console call at your cursor

Log -- Console Log Shortcut.description: Insert a new console.log call at your cursor

Array.description: Insert a new array at your cursor

Object Literal.description: Insert an object literal at your cursor

Property.description: Insert object literal property at cursor
